p.s: There is the discussion if works of the English poet Shakespeare should still be taught in German English classes.
There are people who say that reading poetry that is more than 400 years old would not make sense but I do not agree with that.
William Shakespeare had a huge influence on literature and English language.
Through reading his works we better can understand the modern world and what it is like to be a human being.
In addition Shakespeare invented more than 1500 words and phrases.
We can learn very much from him.
Another advantage of dealing with Shakespeare is that reading his sometimes hard language is challenging and inspiring too.
However, I personally think that teaching works of Shakespeare in German English classes still is important.
There are so many things we can learn from him that it really would make sense for students to read his works.
the fact that the topics Shakespeare wrote about continued to be relevant still today is an argument too.
